title: 184: Advice from a Deep Friar
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Sometimes you have feelings. Romeo is one such person who has feelings. Graeme, inspired by a previous episode, ponders on whether Romeo is an existentialist, meaning that the philosophy is immature.
itunes:author: We're all sixteen! Don't tell us what to do!
itunes:subtitle: Philosophy and fries! Together at last!
itunes:summary: Sometimes you have feelings. Romeo is one such person who has feelings. Graeme, inspired by a previous episode, ponders on whether Romeo is an existentialist, meaning that the philosophy is immature.
itunes:title: 184: Advice from a Deep Friar
